text: Ordway is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Alfred Ordway, American landscape and portrait painter * Frederick I. Ordway III, space scientist and author * Jerry Ordway, comicbook artist and writer * John Ordway, member of the Lewis and Clark expedition * John Ordway (ambassador) (contemporary), American diplomat * John P. Ordway, American songwriter/arranger, music publisher, doctor and politician * Jonathan Ordway, American football player * Glenn Ordway, radio and television broadcaster * Melissa Ordway, American actress and model * Nehemiah G. Ordway, governor of Dakota Territory
title: Ordway (surname)
